long_description: Get off the treadmill and into the outdoors with the Salomon Trail T-shirt. It uses mesh panels for breathability and stash pockets at the side hems for energy food or your media player. Quick-drying, lightweight polyester fabric speeds moisture to the surface for quick evaporation. Breathable mesh underarm fabric panels encourage cooling airflow. Flatlock seams ensure chafe-free comfort. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. Salomon Trail T-shirt features a relaxed fit.
